column5: Very close walk to Will Rogers, UNT Health, museums, cultural district, W. 7th street, botanical gardens, trinity park. On same street that enters into Will Rogers. 5 minute drive downtown. Clean, cozy, hospitable, friendly space. Walk to pubs, restaurants. Cats live here so not good for people with cat allergies or people who dislike cats.
column8: Queen pillow top bed, Walk to Will Rogers, Museums
